name: Not Enough Coffins
description:
There was a time when men settled their disagreements by following only one law: the trigger. The quickest was right... After all, how can you be right if you're dead?

 In Not Enough Coffins you'll prove that you are right by relying exclusively on your revolver. Challenge to a duel the scum that littered the lands of the Wild West: outlaws, swindlers, bounty hunters, drunks and many others. There is a coffin ready for each of them, will you be able to fill them all? But be careful, there's one for you too! 

  •  Unlock weapons that will help you take out anyone who dares to stand on the wrong side of the barrel. 
  • Every legendary gunslinger has a bounty on his head: collect them all to become the best bounty hunter in the West.
  •  Go through characteristic places and landscapes of the era: forts, forests and towns built in the middle of the desert!
  •  Consume your bullets to the tune of soundtracks inspired by the most famous spaghetti-western movies!
